at.tugraz.ist.soma.utils

Class Visualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tugraz.ist.soma.utils.Visualizer

  • public class Visualizer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for the visualisation of your graphs. The generated .dot files can be opened using a program called 'graphviz'.
    Author:
    Stephan Fr√ºhwirt

    • Method Detail

      • createCFGdotFile

        public static void createCFGdotFile(java.util.ArrayList<CFGNode> tree)
        Creates a .dot file of your CFG if you pass "debug" as third console parameter.
        The graph is saved at ../output/'input filename'-cfg.dot
        Parameters:
        tree - An Arraylist of CFGNodes, each node knows its successor/predecessor. It might be necessary to adapt the direction of the arrows in the marked line below!

      • createPDGdotFile

        public static void createPDGdotFile(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Node> tree,
                                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> slice)
        Creates a .dot file of your PDG if you pass "debug" as third console parameter.
        The graph is saved at ../output/'input filename'.dot
        Parameters:
        tree - An Arraylist of Nodes, each node knows its successor/predecessor. It might be necessary to adapt the direction of the arrows in the marked line below!
        slice - The Arraylist containing the slice. These nodes will be marked in the graph.
